name: Ratio
description:
Release squares in different locations in proportion to the target percentage. Turn all targets green at the same time to gain a point, and lose a point by taking longer than 10 seconds.

Ratio is a minimalistic, casual indie game where you aim for the target percentage in order to gain a point.

The game features small haptics which enhance the gaming experience.

Challenge your friends for the high score!

The game has no in-app purchases or ads.
